attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Are you aware that you could raise £52 billion pounds a year in tax revenue alone. How much would that help your deficit??? Allows you to minimise cut backs in services and gets you over 6 million guaranteed votes.Not to mention the police resources saved.

rejection.details: There are already a number of petitions that relate to this topic.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
